laboratory_examinations.findings: Repeatedly elevated TSH and sometimes borderline reduced total T4 values; total T3 was in the normal range.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: 10-times stimulation of TSH was documented at least at two time points.

laboratory_examinations.findings: No reduction of body weight or increase of basal metabolic rate observed.
Low doses of 8–10 mg/m2 body surface area per day administered.
Resulted in normal T4 values and low normal or even suppressed TSH.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Course of obesity characterized by a rapid and extreme gain of weight during the first 4 years of life followed by a stable phase.
